title: District Profile: Michigan's 11th Congressional Race
teaser: In this week’s installment of District Profiles, we look at the race between Democrat Bobby McKenzie and Republican David Trott.
contentencoded:
In this week’s installment of District Profiles, we look at Michigan’s 11th congressional district, where Republican businessman David Trott will take on Democrat Bobby McKenzie.

Jack Lessenberry of Michigan Radio joins Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson to discuss the dynamics of the district and the race.

  • See more District Profiles in our series

Guest

  • Jack Lessenberry, senior political analyst with Michigan Radio. He tweets @JackLessenberry.
